description: Manage monitor private link scope resource.

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope create
commands.summary: Create a private link scope resource.
examples: az monitor private-link-scope create --name MyAzureMonitorPrivateLinkScope --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope delete
commands.summary: Delete a monitor private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope delete [--ids]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--yes]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope delete --name MyAzureMonitorPrivateLinkScope --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope list
commands.summary: List all monitor private link scope resources.

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope show
commands.summary: Show a monitor private link scope resource.
examples: az monitor private-link-scope show --name MyAzureMonitorPrivateLinkScope --resource-group MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope update
commands.summary: Update a monitor private link scope resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor private-link-scope update [--add]
                                     [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                     [--ids]
                                     [--name]
                                     [--remove]
                                     [--resource-group]
                                     [--set]
                                     [--subscription]
                                     [--tags]
examples: az monitor private-link-scope update --name MyAzureMonitorPrivateLinkScope --resource-group MyResourceGroup --tags foo=bar

commands.name: az monitor private-link-scope wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
